title: With the feature disabled, Verify that users will not be able to create the Browse based file constraint policy on the UI
custom_steps:
1.Disable the Feature
2.Login to Tenant UI
3.Click on RealTime Protection under policies
4.Select  any category and select activity as Browse,Upload and Download
5.Click on Add Criteria & Constraints section->File Constraints
6.verify that whether we can create File name or File extension based policy
custom_expected: File extension option should not visible on the UI
